entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
